akn:section.akn:heading: Setting aside verdict of guilty; judgment notwithstanding verdict—(Rule)

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3532. Setting aside verdict of guilty; judgment notwithstanding verdict—(Rule) See Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure Setting aside verdict of guilty on motion for judgment of acquittal, entering of such judgment, or ordering new trial; absence of verdict, Rule 29(b).
(June 25, 1948, ch. 645, 62 Stat. 837.)
